channel.title: Behind the Curtain on
channel.description: Recent content in Behind the Curtain on

item.title: Most read articles in 2021
item.description: In 2021, 26 new posts were published to this blog on topics relating to data and forest products. Have an idea for a post you’d like to see? Email Matt with any suggestions. Here are the most read posts from the Arbor Custom Analytics blog in 2021: Getting your data into R from Google Sheets Creating animated bar charts to visualize sawtimber prices Mixed models in R: a primer

item.title: Most read posts in 2020
item.description: In 2020, 29 new posts were published to this blog on topics relating to data and forest products. Have an idea for a post you’d like to see? Email Matt with any suggestions. Here are the most read posts from the Arbor Custom Analytics blog in 2020: Mixed models in R: a primer Getting your data into R from Google Sheets The three kinds of data scientists in forestry
